post_detail.title: Jon's Song Music Video
post_detail.description:
My Contribution:

I wrote, produced, performed the song.

Execution:

This video sits inside of a larger project which is the creation of a full-length album of original music. We filmed the band shots in my Hoboken apartment to a music track played at half speed so that when the footage was sped up twice as fast in post production to match the music, it gave the scenes added energy and vibrance.
